Articles.Content:
Kerbal Dynamics is a mod which will include different aircraft parts suiting all of your needs. This mod will include military aircraft parts (F-16-esque noses, fuselages, etc.), wings, flaps, air brakes, commercial aviation parts (767/A330-esque noses, fuselage parts, double-decker fuselages, 747/A380-esque noses, etc.), adapters, and more.

In-dev shots:

imgur link

UPDATE

Most of the models have been complete for the first release.

It is expected to be complete in a week or so after I code most of the models.

Rob did a fantastic job with the modeling
Keep up the good work! There can never be too many aviation parts, but keep aware of the similar mods that are already out there so you don't waste your time with too much duplication.

Hi!

We definitely consider other mods when making parts. At least I do

That cockpit looks great! Kinda similar to the C-Series.

Keep up the good work!

UPDATE

All parts for first release finished. First few parts entering the game tonight.

http://imgur.com/a/AMlbD#0

UPDATE

First part fully textured, added collision mesh to, and almost in the game. Adding crew capabilities.

UPDATE

What is life...?

I got the part into KSP and textured.. but it's upside down, and the attachment nodes are way off.

Also, wat de crap is wrong with the collision mesh?!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

UPDATE

Major redesign of the module. It's taking way longer than it is supposed to be taking.

UPDATE

Tomorrow the part will be fixed! Yay!

Thanks!

We're officially moving from SketchUp right into Blender.

SketchUp importing glitch into Blender was the cause of the attachment node glitches.

I, sadly, was not able to do any work yesterday

Today I hopefully will get the first model fully ready for release.

UPDATE

Thanks to keptin for sending me some nifty links to tutorials. Looks like I'm on a better track now.
